formatDescription: TrueSpace was a commercial 3D computer graphics and animation software originally developed by Caligari Corporation before being acquired by Microsoft. The .scn extension indicates a scene, the .cob extension indicates an object.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
